message.name: ERR_PERSONSEARCH_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: No Person Search implemented. Please contact an Administrator.

message.name: ERR_PERSONSEARCH_FV_FIRST_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: First name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric character(s).

message.name: ERR_PERSONSEARCH_FV_LAST_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: Last name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric character(s).

message.name: ERR_PERSONSEARCH_FV_BIRTH_LAST_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: Birth last name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric character(s).

message.name: INF_PERSONSEARCH_EXACT_MATCH
message.locale: An exact match has been performed on first name and/or last name because only a single character was entered into the search field.

message.name: ERR_PERSONSEARCH_FV_FIRST_NAME_SHORT_PARTIAL_MATCH
message.locale: First name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters in order to include a wildcard character.

message.name: ERR_PERSONSEARCH_FV_LAST_NAME_SHORT_PARTIAL_MATCH
message.locale: Last name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters in order to include a wildcard character.

message.name: ERR_PERSONSEARCH_FV_BIRTH_LAST_NAME_SHORT_PARTIAL_MATCH
message.locale: Birth last name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters in order to include a wildcard character.
